settings.custom_liquid:
<script>
    document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function () {
        var observer = new MutationObserver(function (mutationsList) {
            mutationsList.forEach(function (mutation) {
                if (mutation.type === "childList") {
                    document.querySelectorAll(".money, .product-price-wrapper").forEach(function (priceElement) {
                        let priceText = priceElement.textContent;
                        if (priceText.includes("$")) {
                            priceText = priceText.replace("$", "Rp.");
                        }
                        if (priceText.includes(".00")) {
                            priceText = priceText.replace(".00", "");
                        }
                        priceElement.textContent = priceText;
                    });
                }
            });
        });

        observer.observe(document.body, { childList: true, subtree: true });

        // Initial update for prices already in the DOM
        document.querySelectorAll(".money, .product-price-wrapper").forEach(function (priceElement) {
            let priceText = priceElement.textContent;
            if (priceText.includes("$")) {
                priceText = priceText.replace("$", "Rp.");
            }
            if (priceText.includes(".00")) {
                priceText = priceText.replace(".00", "");
            }
            priceElement.textContent = priceText;
        });
    });
</script>
